tests.name: ntp.network.ntp_support
tests.test_description: Does the device request network time sync as client as per RFC 5905 - Network Time Protocol Version 4: Protocol and Algorithms Specification
tests.expected_behavior: The device sends an NTPv4 request to the configured NTP server.
recommendations: Set the NTP version to v4 in the NTP client
Install an NTP client that supports NTPv4

tests.name: ntp.network.ntp_dhcp
tests.expected_behavior: Device can accept NTP server address, provided by the DHCP server (DHCP OFFER PACKET)
recommendations: Install an NTP client that supports fetching the NTP servers from DHCP options
